levels.description: After deployment, immediately deals <@ba.vup>{appear.atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage twice to all surrounding enemies and <$ba.stun>Stuns</> them for <@ba.vup>{appear.stun}</> seconds, then releases a Sword Rain at up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> different targets within range every second that deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage and <$ba.stun>Stuns</> for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds
